title: Balked at the altar
creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
brief_description: An eligible bachelor becomes an unwilling victim of a father’s plan to help his daughter find a husband. Cast includes Mabel Stoughton, Linda Arvidson, George Gebhardt, D.W. Griffith, Robert Harron, Mack Sennett, Arthur V. Johnson, Harry Solter. Silent film with musical soundtrack.
